sentences.sContent: This led me, as a behavioral economist, to an intriguing hypothesis.
sentences.sContent_eng: This led me, as a behavioral economist, to an intriguing hypothesis.
sentences.sCn: 这让我，作为一个行为经济学家，想到一个有趣的假设。

sentences.sContent: However, the economist cannot simply give those answers and leave it at that.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, the economist cannot simply give those answers and leave it at that.
sentences.sCn: 然而，经济学家不能仅仅给出那样的答案就算了事。

sentences.sContent: Make sail: Define and explain an idea, it is economist commonly or Mr. MBA does.
sentences.sContent_eng: Make sail: Define and explain an idea, it is economist commonly or Mr. MBA does.
sentences.sCn: 张帆： 定义和解释一个概念，一般是经济学家或者MBA老师做的。

words.tran: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济地；在经济上；节俭地
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家

trans.tranOther: someone who studies the way in which money and goods are produced and used and the systems of business and trade
